roleset.name: tease good-naturedly
roleset.note: CHAFF-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from chaff.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: When [they]*-2 stood about his tent [*T*-1], [*-2] chaffing each other ,exchanging their obscenities , cursing command or weather , he had studiedtheir faces .
